function: Fetch dynamic data from backend APIs for rendering player stats, team info, and game results.
static_description: The frontend displays various sections including player statistics tables, team management panels, and game simulation outputs. All data is fetched dynamically via RESTful endpoints.

interaction_and_states.description: Triggers API calls to refresh displayed data when navigating between tabs or pages.

resource_dependency.postgresql_schema_definitions: Define schemas for users, teams, players, games, stats, finances, and lineups with appropriate relationships.

function: Establish connection to PostgreSQL database using predefined environment variables and define required schemas.
static_description: Backend server connects to a PostgreSQL instance using provided credentials. Schemas for entities such as users, teams, players, and game logs are created upon initialization.

resource_dependency.stat_fields_schema: Fields include batting_average (float), home_runs (int), rbis (int), era (float), strikeouts (int), etc.

function: Display detailed performance metrics for individual baseball players.
static_description: A card-based layout showing player headshots, names, positions, and key statistical indicators like batting average, ERA, RBIs, and more. Icons represent different stat categories.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting a player opens a modal with extended stats history and trend graphs.

function: Allow users to create, modify, and manage baseball teams through form inputs.
static_description: Form interface with fields for team name, logo upload, city selection, and initial budget setting. Buttons for saving changes or deleting teams.

interaction_and_states.description: Submit button sends POST request to create or update team records in the database.

resource_dependency.roster_table_schema: Columns: Player Name, Position, Status, Actions (Add/Remove)

function: Enable adding, removing, and organizing players within team rosters.
static_description: Sortable table listing current roster members with drag-and-drop capability to reorder players. Buttons to add new players or release existing ones.

interaction_and_states.description: Reorder players in lineup by dragging rows up or down.
Use '+' or '-' buttons to add/remove players directly from the roster.

function: Track and display team financial status including income, expenses, and balance.
static_description: Dashboard panel showing total balance, recent transactions, and spending breakdowns by category. Graphical representation of cash flow over time.

interaction_and_states.description: Navigate to full transaction log page when clicking on balance summary.

function: Process and simulate baseball games based on selected team strategies and lineups.
static_description: Control panel with dropdowns for selecting starting pitcher, batting order arrangement, and defensive positioning options. Start Simulation button initiates processing.

interaction_and_states.description: Start Simulation triggers backend job that returns real-time event stream.

function: Visualize outcomes of completed baseball games with scores and key plays.
static_description: Scoreboard graphic showing inning-by-inning scoring, final score, and winning pitcher. Tabular box score detailing hits, runs, errors per team.

interaction_and_states.description: Click on play-by-play highlights to view detailed descriptions of pivotal moments.

function: Provide interactive tools for modifying team strategy and lineup settings pre-simulation.
static_description: Interactive form with draggable lists for batting order, selector for pitcher rotation, and toggle switches for defensive alignments.

interaction_and_states.description: Rearrange batting order by dragging player cards into desired slots.
Toggle defensive alignment presets using labeled switch controls.

function: Apply specified color scheme throughout the UI for consistent branding.
static_description: All backgrounds use floral white (#fffaf0) while buttons, links, and active states utilize dark goldenrod (#b8860b). Consistent styling across all pages.

interaction_and_states.description: Buttons and interactive elements darken slightly on hover to indicate interactivity.

resource_dependency.protected_routes_middleware: Check auth header before serving sensitive routes

function: Manage user authentication and maintain secure sessions for personalized access.
static_description: Login screen with email/password fields and Submit button. Redirects authenticated users to dashboard automatically.

interaction_and_states.description: Submit login credentials which are verified against stored hashes; successful login sets JWT in localStorage.

resource_dependency.persistent_storage_schema: Tables for players, teams, games, stats, finances with foreign key constraints

function: Ensure long-term storage of all relevant application data including stats, teams, finances, and results.
static_description: Database stores structured records of every entity involved in gameplay and management. Regular automated backups ensure data integrity.

function: Deliver live updates during game simulations to keep UI synchronized with backend events.
static_description: Progress bar indicating simulation advancement alongside streaming textual commentary of ongoing game actions.

interaction_and_states.description: Update UI elements like scoreboard and commentary feed in real-time without manual refresh.

resource_dependency.responsive_css_framework: Tailwind CSS or Bootstrap grid system

function: Adapt layout and functionality seamlessly across desktop and mobile devices.
static_description: Flexible grids and scalable components adjust based on viewport size. Touch-friendly controls replace mouse-specific interactions on smaller screens.

interaction_and_states.description: Layout reflows and adjusts element sizes dynamically depending on available screen space.

resource_dependency.package_json_structure: {"scripts": {"install:all": "concurrently \"cd client && npm i\" \"cd server && npm i\"", "dev": "concurrently \"cd client && npm run dev\" \"cd server && npm run dev\""}}

function: Configure repository scripts for unified installation and development startup of frontend and backend.
static_description: Root level package.json file contains two main commands: install:all and dev, managed using concurrently to execute parallel tasks.
